content: hey guys I dam Scotty good to have you with me if you're a fan of the DMS craft
and you've been with my vids for awhile you recognize this glass block wall
behind me haven't shown this in a while but I had an idea I want to run past the
community the idea was to for me to create a unique adventure not a
published one make it up and then craft everything for that adventure so it'll
start from interview literally from start that can the concept all the way
to the finished idea and I think it's a pretty cool idea and I partially done
this with AJ's crypt but I've never really done anything like this so if
this is a cool idea that you think you'd like to see there are several ways you
can tell me I guess the first would be YouTube
you're watching YouTube you could comment so you could comment that way
another way is my forum another great place to meet crafters who are
like-minded and exchange ideas about our crafting you can tell me there or I have
a brand new space on Facebook which I have a link below you can join that
group we'd love to have you and you can tell me there I'd like to hear ideas
opinions anything like that so those are the three ways you can you can talk
about this or make suggestions so yeah I thought this is a cool idea so if you're
if you're interested and you'd like to see more I want to hear about it and
